name: mintun
description: A batch minting contract and integration with Lucid for interacting with that contract
author: Genun Games

scripts.build:aiken: aiken build contracts && mv contracts/plutus.json offchain/contracts.json
scripts.build:aiken:trace: aiken build contracts --trace-level verbose && mv contracts/plutus.json offchain/contracts.json
scripts.build: pnpm build:aiken && pnpm build:offchain && pnpm build:web
scripts.build:full:trace: pnpm build:aiken:trace && pnpm build:offchain && pnpm build:web
